participant_1.background:

I enjoy reading my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekend.
i take medication.
I am not close to my family and do not know what they do for a living.

participant_2.background:
I watch YouTube videos about welding to learn new things and keep my mind off my best friend who just moved away.
I am often up late at night working on my art, so I'm not a morning person.
I start my day with coffee and a quick practice session before heading off to city council meetings.
I drank a cup of chai tea before going to bed.
i play tabletop games with friends.

content.text: What do you enjoy doing in your free time?
I watch a lot of YouTube videos about welding to learn new things and keep my mind off my best friend who just moved away.
Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that about your best friend. What kind of YouTube videos do you watch?
I like to watch videos about welding, metalworking, and other crafts. I also like to watch tabletop games and D&D game sessions.
That's cool! I watch a lot of YouTube videos too. I like to watch videos about fixing up junk cars and making YouTube videos about it.
That's awesome! I love watching YouTube videos about cars and car repair.
Yeah, I'm really into it. I've been working on a junk car for a few months now and I'm making good progress on it.
That's awesome! What kind of car is it?
It's a 1970 Ford Mustang. It's a project car that I'm restoring.
That's awesome! I love old Mustangs.
Thanks! I'm excited to finish it.
I'm sure it will be awesome
